climbs.name: Uncle Reach
climbs.fa: Mark Robinson, Wills Young, Caitlin Robinson, Jay Smith

content.description: Starting to the left of Blasphemy 5.9, "seam to face, finish up a right-slanting flake."

climbs.name: Split Personality
climbs.fa: Kelly Cordner, Margy Marshall, Derick Olson. Dave Pedersen, Theresa Otto

content.description: face, crack and seam climbing. Crux at 6th bolt.
content.location: left most route on Holy Trinity Wall

climbs.name: Sex Packets
climbs.fa: Scott Ayers, Mike Strassman, Eden Masters, Jay Ladin, 1990, GU

content.description:
Cool pockets down low lead to a technical, thin bulge (the crux). Excellent moves throughout.

Rumor has that this climb was on the Bachar solo circuit. Something to think about.
content.location: To the right of Sex (5.11d) and left of Faith No More (5.12c). It is best to do a low 5th class scramble down and from the right (25'), to the anchors at the base shared with Sex Packets and Faith No More.

content.description: Bouldery start in a shallow dihedral leads to fun face climbing, ending on a small ledge.
content.location: Between Pick Pocket and Uncle Reach.

content.description: The first sport route in the gorge.  Ground up bolted by John Bachar in the late 80's.  This route is easily identified but its copious amounts of chalk.  Start off of the boulder and crank hard starting moves up the pocketed face.  Halfway up move a little left to gain a good ledge. From the ledge either bust out left to a juggy flake system or continue up and right and then back left on pockets (harder but not as good).  The pockets on this climb are amazing.

climbs.name: One Gun Salute
climbs.fa: kelly Cordner, Margy Marshall, Derick Olson. Theresa Otto

content.description: Face climbing along a crack. Cruxes above bolts 1 & 5.
content.location: Upper left side of Holy Trinity wall

content.description: Start in the blocky and loose chimney to the right of Blasphemy. Climb overhanging face on slopey pockets. Pumpy and engaging.
content.location: Start in the chimney to the right of Blasphemy. Step right onto the overhanging face adjacent to Sex.

content.description: Clip the first 4 bolts of Uncle Reach, then traverse left and finish up Please Baby, Baby, Baby, Please.
Easy 11- climbing to a v4-5 crux, pumpy moves to the last bolt. Harder if you're short.
content.location: To the right of Sex Packets, shares first bolt.

content.description: Establish a belay at the base of the route using the 1st bolt as an anchor. Big reaches to positive holds lead mid height to a harder move left where a pump starts. Continue up through a difficult  crux and manage what you have left past a couple of more bolts and a Mussy lower off. Really nice rock but a showstopper crux that both my partner and I thought was harder than 11d.
content.location: Route right of Faith No More. An short easy 5th class scramble seems best to bela.y

climbs.name: Crack of Dawn
climbs.fa: Kelly Cordner, Margy Marshall, Derick Olson. Dave Pedersen, Theresa Otto

content.description: Crack to face. Cruxes around the 6th and 10th bolt
content.location: HIgh left side of Holy Trinity Wall

content.description: Great technical edging. Kinda climbs like less than vert granite

What if Steck/Salathe, Chouinard/Herbert, and Hillary/Norgay had said, 'Why bother?"

Thankfully, Broski/Linaweaver didn't either.

Fun moves, and some thoughtful meandering.

Last third chossy.

Direct finish harder than 10b IMO. Indirect finish (to the right), easier than 10b.
content.protection:
If leader falls before first bolt, nastiness ensues. Can establish safer belay with 3/4 to 1 inch cams in a crack up and to the right of base.

5 bolts to rusty chains.
content.location: The route is well to the right of the famous Sex/Sex Packets buttress, climbing the right side of an obvious face. Starts some 20 feet or more up a gully.

content.description: Crux is getting to first bolt. This route shares the first six bolts with chameleon. Then take the black hangers and head up and right where it’s obvious that it’s easier climbing. Stick clip recommended
Cruxes at left leaning section 1st half (tippy and awkward) and below the transition from crack to flake near the top. Remarkable finger locks and holds near the top.
content.location: start is left of the large dark chimney.  climb short right leaning block then ascend left side of large dark chimney to crack.

climbs.name: Biochemically Compacted Sexual Affection (aka, "Sex")
climbs.fa: Scott Ayers, Jeff Schoen & Eden Masters, 1990

content.description: This very aesthetic and potentially pumpy route follows the very blunt arete/face to the left of "Sex Packets" (Not to be confused with the deceiving blunt arete immediately adjacent to the 5.9 "Blasphemy")  No stand-out cruxes, but it feels long and sustained, not to mention exposed. This route will seem less pumpy if you have good technique. Considering the high quality of this route, it seems under-traveled.
content.location: One of a couple routes between "Sex Packets" and "Pick Pocket." Scramble up some ledges and a right leaning ramp, then head up the short, right facing corner to start the route.

content.description: Arete climb where you gain instant exposure. Follow the arete to the anchors. Climb is on the Staging Tower. The approach can be slippery. A fall from here wouldn't make your day.
content.location: A little down and to the right of Flavin Haven. The route is on a prominent tower.
